info.title: DPIRD Weather - West Australia
info.description: Comprehensive data from over 185 weather stations throughout Western Australia, as well as data from other third party weather stations.

get.description: Returns a list of stations and their metadata.

parameters.name: stationCode
parameters.description: A comma separated list of case-sensitive station codes. Limits the stations which will be returned.

get.description: Get Weather Stations for Lookup

parameters.name: limit
parameters.x-ms-summary: The pagination limit parameter restricts the number of entries returned.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: A comma separated list of fields to sort by, defaulted to stationName.

parameters.name: select
parameters.description: A comma separated list of fields to include in the result, defaulted to stationCode and stationName to reduce payload size.

get.description: Gets the availability metadata for weather stations

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: The start date for a custom availability period. Must be sent along with end date.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: The end date for a custom availability period. Must be sent along with start date.

get.description: Returns a list of nearby stations, sorted by distance. Use paging to control the number of stations returned. Returns 5 stations by default. Sorted by distance from location ascending.

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: The latitude to search by in decimal degrees.

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: The longitude to search by in decimal degrees.

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: Only look for stations within this kilometer range. Defaults to 100km.

get.description: Get the metadata for a specific station
Get Single Weather Station Availability

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: The start date for a custom availability period (YYY-MM-DD). Must be sent along with end date.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: The end date for a custom availability period (YYY-MM-DD). Must be sent along with start date.

get.description: Returns daily 9am bulletins for a list of stations. The daily 9am bulletin is a summary where every field has been summarized over the 24 hour period to 9am.
Get the rainfall weather stations have received over various time periods up to the current time.
Get the rainfall weather station has received over various time periods up to the current time.

Get the amount of time weather stations have had extreme conditions for, over various time periods. The extreme conditions indicated are: frost conditions - where temperature is less than or equal to 2°C; heat conditions - where temperature is greater than or equal to 30°C; and erosion conditions - where wind is greater than or equal to 28.8km/h.
Find extreme values for weather stations.

parameters.name: operator
parameters.description: Return values greater than or less than the supplied value

parameters.name: threshold
parameters.description: The extrema value to search greater or less than for.

parameters.name: property
parameters.description: The weather station property to search on

parameters.name: interval
parameters.description: The interval of data to use. Uses minute data by default. Larger intervals will use summary data
parameters.x-ms-summary: The interval of data to use.

get.description: Get the latest data for a series of stations. Returns all active stations by default.
Returns daily 9am bulletins for a station. The daily 9am bulletin is a summary where every field has been summarized over the 24 hour period to 9am.

get.summary: Get Single Weather Station Latest Data
get.description: Get the latest data for a station.

get.summary: Get Single Weather Station Minute Data
get.description: Returns minute recordings for a station over a maximum 24 hour period.

parameters.name: startDateTime
parameters.description: Start of date range to return recordings inclusive of. The date range must not be more than 24 hours.

parameters.name: endDateTime
parameters.description: End of date range to return recordings inclusive of. The date range must not be more than 24 hours.

get.description: Returns a set of quarter-hourly summaries for a list of stations. Note that the 15min summary is only available from the beginning of the previous year to the current date.
Returns a set of half-hourly summaries for a list of stations. Note that the 30min summary is only available from the beginning of the previous year to the current date.
Returns a set of hourly summaries for a list of stations.

Returns a set of daily summaries for a list of stations. The 24 hour period each field is summarized over varies between 24 hours to 9am (eg rainfall, minimum temperature), 24 hours from 9am (eg maximum temperature) and 24 hours from 12am (eg wind, solar)

Returns a set of monthly summaries for a list of stations. The monthly period each field is summarized over is a monthly composite of the same 24 hour period used by the field in the daily summary. For example, rainfall, which uses the 24 hours to 9am daily period starts at 9am on the last day of the previous month and concludes at 9am on the last day of the month.

Returns a set of annual summaries for a list of stations. The yearly period each field is summarized over is a yearly composite of the same 24 hour period used by the field in the daily summary. For example, rainfall, which uses the 24 hours to 9am daily period starts at 9am on the last day of the previous year and concludes at 9am on the last day of the year.

Returns a set of quarter-hourly time-series summaries for a list of stations. Useful for charts. Note that the 15min summary is only available from the beginning of the previous year to the current date.
Returns a set of half-hourly time-series summaries for a list of stations. Useful for charts.

get.summary: Get Weather Stations Hourly Summary Timeseries
get.description: Returns a set of hourly time-series summaries for a list of stations. Useful for charts.

get.summary: Get Weather Stations Daily Summary Timeseries
get.description: Returns a set of daily time-series summaries for a list of stations. Useful for charts.

get.summary: Get Weather Stations Monthly Summary Timeseries
get.description: Returns a set of monthly time-series summaries for a list of stations. Useful for charts.

get.summary: Get Weather Stations Yearly Summary Timeseries
get.description: Returns a set of yearly time-series summaries for a list of stations. Useful for charts.
Returns a set of quarter-hourly summaries for a specific station. Note that the 30min summary is only available from the beginning of the previous year to the current date.
Returns a set of half-hourly summaries for a specific station. Note that the 15min summary is only available from the beginning of the previous year to the current date.

get.summary: Get Single Weather Station Hourly Summary
get.description: Returns a set of hourly summaries for a specific station.

get.summary: Get Single Weather Station Daily Summary
get.description: Returns a set of daily summaries for a specific station. The 24 hour period each field is summarized over varies between 24 hours to 9am (eg rainfall, minimum temperature), 24 hours from 9am (eg maximum temperature) and 24 hours from 12am (eg wind, solar).

get.summary: Get Single Weather Station Monthly Summary
get.description: Returns a set of monthly summaries for a specific station. The monthly period each field is summarized over is a monthly composite of the same 24 hour period used by the field in the daily summary. For example, rainfall, which uses the 24 hours to 9am daily period starts at 9am on the last day of the previous month and concludes at 9am on the last day of the month.

get.summary: Get Single Weather Station Yearly Summary
get.description: Returns a set of yearly summaries for a specific station. The yearly period each field is summarized over is a yearly composite of the same 24 hour period used by the field in the daily summary. For example, rainfall, which uses the 24 hours to 9am daily period starts at 9am on the last day of the previous year and concludes at 9am on the last day of the year.

apiMetaDataModel.description: A wrapper on all responses providing useful information related to the API call.

stationCode.description: The unique identifier for a station. Case sensitive.

stationName.description: The human readable name of the weather station.

stationCode.description: The unique identifier for a station. Case sensitive.

stationName.description: The human readable name of the weather station.

panEvaporation.description: Class A pan evaporation value calculated using the Penman-Monteith formulation. In case of a daily summary (interval = 'daily'), this value is based on the 24 hours to 9 am on the specified day.

richardsonUnits.description: The accumulated richardson chill units. In case of a daily summary (interval = 'daily'), this value is based on the 24 hours to 9 am on the specified day.

chillHours.description: The number of hours that were measured below 7.2 degrees celsius [C] . In case of a daily summary (interval = 'daily'), this value is based on the 24 hours to 9 am on the specified day.

solarExposure.description: The solar exposure for the period in kilojoules per square meters [kJ/m2]. In case of a daily summary (interval = 'daily'), this value is the solar exposure observed in the 24 hours from 12 am (midnight) on the specified day.

rainfall.description: The total rainfall for the period in millimeters [mm]. In case of a daily summary (interval = 'daily'), this value is the total rainfall observed in the 24 hours to 9 am on the specified day.

errors.description: Number of errors within the specified period.

period.description: The calendar based time-period of the specified interval. For monthly and yearly intervals, standard calendar periods are used for the period bounds rather than the actual summary periods. Please note the actual summary period for monthly and yearly are based on daily summaries, so accordingly the corresponding measurements that are offset from midnight will start at 9am the day before the period or finish at 9am the day after the period.

airTemperature.description: The observed air temperature in degrees celsius.

apparentAirTemperature.description: The apparent ('feels like') air temperature in degrees celsius.

dewPoint.description: The dewpoint observed within the period in degrees celsius.

soilTemperature.description: The soil temperature observed at 4 cm depth within the period in degrees celsius.

deltaT.description: The deltaT observed within the period in degrees celsius [C].

wetBulb.description: The wet bulb temperature observed within the period in degrees celsius [C].

wind.description: The wind observations of one or more wind sensors at various heights.

barometricPressure.description: The barometric pressure observed within the period in hectopascals [hPa]

stationCode.description: The unique identifier for a station. Case sensitive.

stationName.description: The human readable name of the weather station.

from.title: Summary Interval Start
from.description: The start of the specified interval in UTC

to.title: Summary Interval End
to.description: The end of the specified interval in UTC.

year.title: Summary Year
year.description: This is the year value that the summary relates to.

month.title: Summary Month
month.description: This is the month value that the summary relates to.

day.title: Summary Day
day.description: This is the day of the month that the summary relates to.

hour.title: Summary Hour
hour.description: This is the 24-hour value that the summary relates to.

minute.title: Summary Minute
minute.description: This is the minute value that the summary data relates to. In case of a 15 minute or 30 minute interval, the minute value will represent the end of the interval.

period.description: The time-period of the specified interval.

min.title: AirTempMin
min.description: The minimum value observed within the period. In case of a daily summary (interval = 'daily'), this value is the minimum value observed in the 24 hours to 9 am on the specified day.

minTime.title: AirTempMinTime
minTime.description: The date and time the minimum value was observed within the period in UTC. In case of a daily summary (interval = 'daily'), this value is date and time the minimum value is observed in the 24 hours to 9 am on the specified day.

max.title: AirTempMax
max.description: The maximum value observed within the period. In case of a daily summary (interval = 'daily'), this value is the maximum value observed in the 24 hours from 9 am on the specified day.

maxTime.title: AirTempMaxTime
maxTime.description: The date and time the maximum value was observed within the period in UTC. In case of a daily summary (interval = 'daily'), this value is the date and time the maximum value is observed in the 24 hours from 9 am on the specified day.

avg.title: AirTempAvg
avg.description: The average value observed over the period. In case of a daily summary (interval = 'daily'), this value is the average value observed in the 24 hours from 12 am (midnight) on the specified day.

airTemperature.description: The observed air temperature in degrees celsius.

min.title: ApparentAirTempMin
min.description: The minimum value observed within the period. In case of a daily summary (interval = 'daily'), this value is the minimum value observed in the 24 hours to 9 am on the specified day.

minTime.title: ApparentAirTempMinTime
minTime.description: The date and time the minimum value was observed within the period in UTC. In case of a daily summary (interval = 'daily'), this value is the date and time the minimum value is observed in the 24 hours to 9 am on the specified day.

max.title: ApparentAirTempMax
max.description: The maximum value observed within the period. In case of a daily summary (interval = 'daily'), this value is the maximum value observed in the 24 hours from 9 am on the specified day.

maxTime.title: ApparentAirTempMaxTime
maxTime.description: The date and time the maximum value was observed within the period in UTC. In case of a daily summary (interval = 'daily'), this value is the date and time the maximum value is observed in the 24 hours from 9 am on the specified day.

avg.title: ApparentAirTempAvg
avg.description: The average value observed over the period. In case of a daily summary (interval = 'daily'), this value is the average value observed in the 24 hours from 12 am (midnight) on the specified day.

apparentAirTemperature.description: The apparent ('feels like') air temperature in degrees celsius.

min.title: RelHumMin
min.description: The minimum value observed within the period. In case of a daily summary (interval = 'daily'), this value is the minimum value observed in the 24 hours from 9 am on the specified day.

minTime.title: RelHumMinTime
minTime.description: The date and time the minimum value was observed within the period in UTC. In case of a daily summary (interval = 'daily'), this value is the date and time the minimum value is observed in the 24 hours from 9 am on the specified day.

max.title: RelHumMax
max.description: The maximum value observed within the period. In case of a daily summary (interval = 'daily'), this value is the maximum value observed in the 24 hours to 9 am on the specified day.

maxTime.title: RelHumMaxTime
maxTime.description: The date and time the maximum value was observed within the period in UTC. In case of a daily summary (interval = 'daily'), this value is the date and time the maximum value is observed in the 24 hours to 9 am on the specified day.

avg.title: RelHumAvg
avg.description: The average value observed over the period. In case of a daily summary (interval = 'daily'), this value is the average value observed in the 24 hours from 12 am (midnight) on the specified day.

min.title: DewPointMin
min.description: The minimum value observed within the period. In case of a daily summary (interval = 'daily'), this value is the minimum value observed in the 24 hours to 9 am on the specified day.

minTime.title: DewPointMinTime
minTime.description: The date and time the minimum value was observed within the period in UTC. In case of a daily summary (interval = 'daily'), this value is the date and time the minimum value is observed in the 24 hours to 9 am on the specified day.

max.title: DewPointMax
max.description: The maximum value observed within the period. In case of a daily summary (interval = 'daily'), this value is the maximum value observed in the 24 hours from 9 am on the specified day.

maxTime.title: DewPointMaxTime
maxTime.description: The date and time the maximum value was observed within the period in UTC. In case of a daily summary (interval = 'daily'), this value is the date and time the maximum value is observed in the 24 hours from 9 am on the specified day.

avg.title: DewPointAvg
avg.description: The average value observed over the period. In case of a daily summary (interval = 'daily'), this value is the average value observed in the 24 hours from 12 am (midnight) on the specified day.

dewPoint.description: The dewpoint observed within the period in degrees celsius.

panEvaporation.description: Class A pan evaporation value calculated using the Penman-Monteith formulation. In case of a daily summary (interval = 'daily'), this value is based on the 24 hours to 9 am on the specified day.

shortCrop.description: Short crop evapotranspiration value calculated at 0.12 metres [m] using the FAO56 Penman-Monteith method. In case of a daily summary (interval = 'daily'), this value is based on the 24 hours from 12 am (midnight) on the specified day.

tallCrop.description: Tall crop evapotranspiration value calculated at 0.5 metres [m] using the FAO56 Penman-Monteith method. In case of a daily summary (interval = 'daily'), this value is based on the 24 hours from 12 am (midnight) on the specified day.

richardsonUnits.description: The accumulated richardson chill units. In case of a daily summary (interval = 'daily'), this value is based on the 24 hours to 9 am on the specified day.

chillHours.description: The number of hours that were measured below 7.2 degrees celsius. In case of a daily summary (interval = 'daily'), this value is based on the 24 hours to 9 am on the specified day.

solarExposure.description: The solar exposure for the period in kilojoules per square meters [kJ/m2]. In case of a daily summary (interval = 'daily'), this value is the solar exposure observed in the 24 hours from 12 am (midnight) on the specified day.

rainfall.description: The total rainfall for the period in millimeters [mm]. In case of a daily summary (interval = 'daily'), this value is the total rainfall observed in the 24 hours to 9 am on the specified day.

minutes.title: ErosionCondMinutes
minutes.description: Number of minutes of wind speed greater than or equal to 8 metres per second [m/s] (28.8 [km/h]) measured in the 24 hours from 12am (midnight). Only calculated for stations that have a wind probe at a height that is less than or equal to 3 metres [m] above ground.

startTime.title: ErosionCondStartTime
startTime.description: This is the first occurrence of erosion conditions during the specified interval.

min.title: SoilTempMin
min.description: The minimum value observed within the period. In case of a daily summary (interval = 'daily'), this value is the minimum value observed in the 24 hours to 9 am on the specified day.

minTime.title: SoilTempMinTime
minTime.description: The date and time the minimum value was observed within the period in UTC. In case of a daily summary (interval = 'daily'), this value is the date and time the minimum value is observed in the 24 hours to 9 am on the specified day.

max.title: SoilTempMax
max.description: The maximum value observed within the period. In case of a daily summary (interval = 'daily'), this value is the maximum value observed in the 24 hours from 9 am on the specified day.

maxTime.title: SoilTempMaxTime
maxTime.description: The date and time the maximum value was observed within the period in UTC. In case of a daily summary (interval = 'daily'), this value is the date and time the maximum value is observed in the 24 hours from 9 am on the specified day.

avg.title: SoilTempAvg
avg.description: The average value observed over the period. In case of a daily summary (interval = 'daily'), this value is the average value observed in the 24 hours from 12 am (midnight) on the specified day.

soilTemperature.description: The soil temperature observed at 4 cm depth within the period in degrees celsius.

min.title: DeltaTMin
min.description: The minimum value observed within the period. In case of a daily summary (interval = 'daily'), this value is the minimum value observed in the 24 hours to 9 am on the specified day.

minTime.title: DeltaTMinTime
minTime.description: The date and time the minimum value was observed within the period in UTC. In case of a daily summary (interval = 'daily'), this value is the date and time the minimum value is observed in the 24 hours to 9 am on the specified day.

max.title: DeltaTMax
max.description: The maximum value observed within the period. In case of a daily summary (interval = 'daily'), this value is the maximum value observed in the 24 hours from 9 am on the specified day.

maxTime.title: DeltaTMaxTime
maxTime.description: The date and time the maximum value was observed within the period in UTC. In case of a daily summary (interval = 'daily'), this value is the date and time the maximum value is observed in the 24 hours from 9 am on the specified day.

avg.title: DeltaTAvg
avg.description: The average value observed over the period. In case of a daily summary (interval = 'daily'), this value is the average value observed in the 24 hours from 12 am (midnight) on the specified day.

deltaT.description: The deltaT observed within the period in degrees celsius

min.title: WetBulbMin
min.description: The minimum value observed within the period. In case of a daily summary (interval = 'daily'), this value is the minimum value observed in the 24 hours to 9 am on the specified day.

minTime.title: WetBulbMinTime
minTime.description: The date and time the minimum value was observed within the period in UTC. In case of a daily summary (interval = 'daily'), this value is the date and time the minimum value is observed in the 24 hours to 9 am on the specified day.

max.title: WetBulbMax
max.description: The maximum value observed within the period. In case of a daily summary (interval = 'daily'), this value is the maximum value observed in the 24 hours from 9 am on the specified day.

maxTime.title: WetBulbMaxTime
maxTime.description: The date and time the maximum value was observed within the period in UTC. In case of a daily summary (interval = 'daily'), this value is the date and time the maximum value is observed in the 24 hours from 9 am on the specified day.

avg.title: WetBulbAvg
avg.description: The average value observed over the period. In case of a daily summary (interval = 'daily'), this value is the average value observed in the 24 hours from 12 am (midnight) on the specified day.

wetBulb.description: The wet bulb temperature observed within the period in degrees celsius.

minutes.title: FrostConditionMinutes
minutes.description: The number of minutes that the air temperature is below 2 degrees celsius in the 24 hours to 9 am on the specified day. Only calculated for stations that have an air temperature probe at a height that is less than or equal to 3m above ground.

startTime.title: FrostConditionStartTime
startTime.description: This is the first occurrence of a measured air temperature less than or equal to 2 degrees celsius in the 24 hours to 9 am on the specified day. Only calculated for stations that have an air temperature probe at a height that is less than or equal to 3m above ground.

minutes.title: HeatConditionMinutes
minutes.description: The number of minutes that the air temperature is greater than or equal to 30 degrees celsius in the 24 hours from 12 am (midnight) on the specified day. Only calculated for stations that have an air temperature probe at a height that is less than or equal to 3 metres [m] above ground.

startTime.title: HeatConditionStartTime
startTime.description: This is the first occurrence of a measured air temperature greater than or equal to 30 degrees celsius in the 24 hours from 12 am (midnight) on the specified day. Only calculated for stations that have an air temperature probe at a height that is less than or equal to 3 metres [m] above ground.

minVoltage.description: The minimum battery voltage observed for the period in Volts [V]. This value is the minimum value observed in the 24 hours to 9 am on the specified day.

minVoltageDateTime.description: The date and time the minimum value was observed within the period in UTC. This value is the minimum value observed in the 24 hours to 9 am on the specified day.

errors.description: Number of errors within the specified period.

dateTime.description: The date and time the recording was made by the weather station in UTC format.

airTemperature.description: This is the air temperature in degrees celsius at the specified time of recording.

relativeHumidity.description: This is the relative humidity percentage [%] at the specified time of recording.

soilTemperature.description: This is the soil temperature at a depth of 4 centimeters [cm] in degrees celsius at the specified time of recording. Some stations are not equipped with soil sensors.

solarIrradiance.description: This is the solar irradiance in watt per square meter [W/m2] at the specified time of recording.

rainfall.description: This is the rainfall in [mm] at the specified time of recording.

dewPoint.description: This is the dewpoint temperature in degrees celsius at the specified time of recording.

wetBulb.description: This is the wet bulb temperature in degrees celsius at the specified time of recording.

height.description: The height of the sensor in meters [m].

speed.description: The average wind speed observed over the period measured in kilometers per hour [km/h].

compassPoint.description: The average wind direction observed over the period as a compass point.

degrees.description: The average wind direction observed over the period measured in azimuth degrees

direction.description: Only provided for 15 minute, 30 minute and hourly intervals. The average wind direction observed over the period of the specified interval.

avg.description: The average wind speed observed over the period. In the case of a daily summary (interval=daily), this value is based on the 24 hours from 12am (midnight) on the specified day.

windDataModel.description: The wind observations of one or more wind sensors at various heights.

stationCode.description: The unique case-sensitive weather station code.

stationName.description: The given name of the weather station.

dateTime.description: The date and time of the last recording received from the weather station in UTC format.

airTemperature.description: The latest recorded air temperature in degrees celsius

airTemperatureMinLast24Hrs.description: Lowest temperature recorded in the last 24 hrs from current time.

airTemperatureMaxLast24Hrs.description: Highest temperature recorded in the last 24 hrs from current time.

apparentTemperature.description: The latest recorded apparent ('feels like') air temperature in degrees celsius

barometricPressure.description: The latest recorded apparent ('feels like') air temperature in degrees celsius.

relativeHumidity.description: The latest recorded relative humidity percentage [%].

soilTemperature.description: The latest recorded soil temperature at a depth of 4 centimeters [cm] in degrees celsius [°C].

dewPoint.description: The latest recorded dewpoint temperature in degrees celsius.

deltaT.description: The latest recorded deltaT temperature in degrees celsius.

wetBulb.description: This is the wet bulb temperature in degrees celsius at the specified time of recording.

sprayingConditions.description: Spraying conditions are based on deltaT. The available values are “unsuitable”, “marginal” and “preferred”. These values are calculated in the following ways: * unsuitable – will be returned when Delta T is below 2 degrees celcius or greater than 10 degrees celcius. * marginal – will be returned when Delta T is between 8 degrees celcius and 10 degrees celcius. * preferred – will be returned when Delta T is between 2 degrees celcius and 8 degrees celcius

solarExposure.description: The solar exposure from 12am in kilojoules per square meter [kJ/m2].

solarIrradiance.description: The latest solar irradiance in watt per square meters [W/m2].

etoShortCrop.description: Short crop evapotranspiration from 12am (midnight) calculated using the FAO56 Penman-Monteith evapotranspiration at 0.12 metres [m].

etoTallCrop.description: Tall crop evapotranspiration from 12am (midnight) calculated using the FAO56 Penman-Monteith evapotranspiration at 0.5 metres [m].

etoShortCropTo3PM.description: Short crop evapotranspiration calculated over the 24 hours to 3pm using the FAO56 Penman-Monteith evapotranspiration at 0.12 metres. The value is not available (returning null) until after 3pm.

etoTallCropTo3PM.description: Tall crop evapotranspiration calculated over the 24 hours to 3pm using the FAO56 Penman-Monteith evapotranspiration at 0.5 metres [m]. The value is not available (returning null) until after 3pm.

rainfallSince9AM.description: The total rainfall in millimeters [mm] since 9am

rainfallTo3PM.description: The total rainfall in millimeters [mm] in the 24 hours to 3pm. The value is not available (returning null) until after 3pm.

panEvaporation.description: Class A pan evaporation value calculated using the Penman-Monteith formulation. This value is based on the 24 hours to 9am on the specified day.

panEvaporation12AM.description: Class A pan evaporation value calculated using the Penman-Monteith formulation. This value is based on the 24 hours from 12am (midnight) on the specified day.

panEvaporationTo3PM.description: Class A pan evaporation value calculated using the Penman-Monteith formulation. This value is based on the 24 hours to 3pm on the specified day. The value is not available (returning null) until after 3pm.

minutes.description: minutes
minutes
minutes

interval.description: The interval used to generate the response. Calculated by the length of time between startDateTime and endDateTime
interval.title: Interval

stationCode.description: This is the unique case-sensitive weather station code.

latitude.description: Latitude of the weather station in decimal degrees, used for displaying on a map.

longitude.description: Longitude of the weather station in decimal degrees, used for displaying on a map.

numberOfEvents.description: The number of 'extreme weather' events that exceed the specified threshold value within the specified time range. This number depends on the specified interval, e.g. if the interval is not set, then the number of events implies the number of minutes. If the interval is 'daily' then the number of events implies the number of days.

extremeValue.description: The extreme value (lowest or highest – depending on the operator) that was found within the specified range.

stationCode.description: The unique case-sensitive weather station code.

stationName.description: The given name of the weather station.

latitude.description: Latitude of the weather station in decimal degrees, for displaying on a map.

dateTime.description: Longitude of the weather station in decimal degrees, for displaying on a map.

minutes.title: Air temp low minutes to 9am
minutes.description: The number of minutes that the air temperature was less than 2 degrees celsius since 9am.

startTime.title: Air temp low start time since 9am
startTime.description: The date/time of the first occurrence of the air temperature being less than or equal to 2 degrees celsius since 9am.

since9AM.description: The number of minutes that the air temperature was less than or equal to 2 degrees celsius since 9am and the time of the first occurrence in the period.

minutes.title: Air temp low minutes to 9am
minutes.description: The number of minutes that the air temperature was less than 2 degrees celsius in the 24 hours to 9am.

startTime.title: Air temp low start time to 9am
startTime.description: The date/time of the first occurrence of the air temperature being less than or equal to 2 degrees celsius in the 24 hours to 9am.

to9AM.description: The number of minutes that the air temperature was less than or equal to 2 degrees celsius in the 24 hours to 9am and the time of the first occurrence in the period.

minutes.title: Air temp low minutes last 7d
minutes.description: The number of minutes that the air temperature was less than or equal to 2 degrees celsius in the last 7 days and the number of days it has occurred on in the period. Includes the current day and the previous 6.

days.title: Air temp low days last 7d
days.description: The number of minutes that the air temperature was less than or equal to 2 degrees celsius in the last 7 days. Includes the current day and the previous 6.

last7Days.description: The number of minutes that the air temperature was less than or equal to 2 degrees celsius in the last 7 days and the number of days it has occurred on in the period. Includes the current day and the previous 6.

minutes.title: Air temp low minutes last 14d
minutes.description: The number of minutes that the air temperature was less than or equal to 2 degrees celsius in the last 14 days. Includes the current day and the previous 13.

days.title: Air temp low days last 14d
days.description: The number of days the air temperature was less than or equal to 2 degrees celsius in the last 14 days. Includes the current day and the previous 13.

last14Days.description: The number of minutes that the air temperature was less than or equal to 2 degrees celsius in the last 7 days and the number of days it has occurred on in the period. Includes the current day and the previous 13

minutes.title: Air temp low minutes current month
minutes.description: The number of minutes that the air temperature was less than or equal to 2 degrees celsius in the current month.

startTime.title: Air temp low start date current month
startTime.description: The date/time of the first occurrence of the air temperature being less than or equal to 2 degrees celsius in the current month.

days.title: Air temp low days current month
days.description: The number of days the air temperature was less than or equal to 2 degrees celsius in the current month.

monthToDate.description: The total number of minutes that the air temperature was less than or equal to 2 degrees celsius in the current month and the number of days it has occurred on in this period.

minutes.title: Air temp low minutes current year
minutes.description: The number of minutes that the air temperature was less than or equal to 2 degrees celsius in the current year.

startTime.title: Air temp low start time current year
startTime.description: The date/time of the first occurrence of the air temperature being less than or equal to 2 degrees celsius in the current year.

days.title: Air temp low days current year
days.description: The number of days the air temperature was less than or equal to 2 degrees celsius in the current year.

yearToDate.description: The total number of minutes that the air temperature was less than or equal to 2 degrees celsius in the current year and the number of days it has occurred on in this period.

frostCondition.description: The number of minutes that the air temperature was less than or equal to 2 degrees celsius. The start time is available for the current day and the number of days is available for longer periods. Only calculated for stations that have an air temperature probe at a height that is less than or equal to 3 metres [m] above ground.

minutes.title: Air temp minutes high since 12am
minutes.description: The number of minutes that the air temperature has been greater than or equal to 30 degrees celsius in the hours since 12 am.

startTime.title: Air temp high start time since 12am
startTime.description: The date/time of the first occurrence of the air temperature being greater than or equal to 30 degrees celsius in since 12 am.

since12AM.description: The number of minutes that the air temperature was greater than or equal to 30 degrees celsius since 12am and the time of the first occurrence in the period.

minutes.title: Air temp high minutes last 7 days
minutes.description: The number of minutes that the air temperature was greater than or equal to 30 degrees celsius in the last 7 days. Includes the current day and the previous 6.

days.title: Air temp high days last 7 days
days.description: The number of days the air temperature greater than or equal to 30 degrees celsius in the last 7 days. Includes the current day and the previous 6.

last7Days.description: The number of minutes that the air temperature was greater than or equal to 30 degrees celsius in the last 7 days and the number of days it has occurred on in the last 7 days.

minutes.title: Air temp high minutes last 14 days
minutes.description: The number of minutes that the air temperature was greater than or equal to 30 degrees celsius in the last 14 days. Includes the current day and the previous 13.

days.title: Air temp high days last 14 days
days.description: The number of days the air temperature was greater than or equal to 30 degrees celsius in the last 14 days. Includes the current day and the previous 13.

last14Days.description: The number of minutes that the air temperature was greater than or equal to 30 degrees celsius in the last 14 days and the number of days it has occurred on in the last 14 days.

minutes.title: Air temp high minutes current month
minutes.description: The number of minutes that the air temperature was greater than or equal to 30 degrees celsius in the current month.

startTime.title: Air temp high start time current month
startTime.description: The date/time of the first occurrence of the air temperature being greater than or equal to 30 degrees celsius in the current month.

days.title: Air temp high minutes current month
days.description: The number of days the air temperature was greater than or equal to 30 degrees celsius in the current month.

monthToDate.description: The total number of minutes that the air temperature was greater than or equal to 30 degrees celsius in the current month and the number of days it has occurred on in this period.

minutes.title: Air temp high minutes current year
minutes.description: The number of minutes that the air temperature was greater than or equal to 30 degrees celsius in the current year.

startTime.title: Air temp high start time current year
startTime.description: The date/time of the first occurrence of the air temperature being greater than or equal to 30 degrees celsius in the current year.

days.title: Air temp high days current year
days.description: The number of days the air temperature was greater than or equal to 30 degrees celsius in the current year.

yearToDate.description: The total number of minutes that the air temperature was greater than or equal to 30 degrees celsius in the current year and the number of days it has occurred on in this period.

heatCondition.description: The number of minutes that the air temperature was greater than or equal to 30 degrees celsius. The start time is available for the current day and the number of days is available for longer periods. Only calculated for stations that have an air temperature probe at a height that is less than or equal to 3 metres [m] above ground.

minutes.title: Wind Speed Minutes since 12am
minutes.description: The number of minutes that the wind speed was greater than or equal to 8 metres per second [m/s] or 28.8 kilometers per hour [km/h] since 12am.

startTime.title: Wind Speed Start Time since 12am
startTime.description: The date/time of the first occurrence of the wind speed being greater than or equal to 8 metres per second [m/s] or 28.8 kilometers per hour [km/h] [Â°C] since 12am.

since12AM.description: The number of minutes the wind speed was greater than or equal to 8 metres per second [m/s] or 28.8 kilometers per hour [km/h] since 12am and the time of the first occurrence in the period.

minutes.description: The number of minutes the wind speed was greater than or equal to 8 metres per second [m/s] or 28.8 kilometers per hour [km/h] in the last 7 days. Includes the current day and the previous 6.
minutes.title: Wind Speed Minutes Last 7 Days

days.description: The number of days the wind speed was greater than or equal to 8 metres per second [m/s] or 28.8 kilometers per hour [km/h] in the last 7 days. Includes the current day and the previous 6.
days.title: Wind Speed Days Last 7 Days

last7Days.description: The number of minutes the wind speed was greater than or equal to 8 metres per second [m/s] or 28.8 kilometers per hour [km/h] in the last 7 days and the number of days it has occurred on in the period.

minutes.description: The number of minutes that the wind speed is greater than or equal to 8 metres per second [m/s] or 28.8 kilometers per hour [km/h] in the last 14 days. Includes the current day and the previous 13.
minutes.title: Wind Speed Minutes Last 14 days

days.description: The number of days the wind speed was greater than or equal to 8 metres per second [m/s] or 28.8 kilometers per hour [km/h] in the last 14 days. Includes the current day and the previous 13.
days.title: Wind Speed Days Last 14 Days

last14Days.description: The number of minutes the wind speed was greater than or equal to 8 metres per second [m/s] or 28.8 kilometers per hour [km/h] in the last 14 days and the number of days it has occurred on in the period.

minutes.description: The number of minutes that the wind speed was greater than or equal to 8 metres per second [m/s] or 28.8 kilometers per hour [km/h] in the current month.
minutes.title: Wind Speed Minutes Current Month

startTime.title: Wind Speed Start Time Current Month
startTime.description: The date/time of the first occurrence of the wind speed being greater than or equal to 8 metres per second [m/s] or 28.8 kilometers per hour [km/h] in the current month.

days.description: The number of days the wind speed was greater than or equal to 8 metres per second [m/s] or 28.8 kilometers per hour [km/h] in the current month.
days.title: Wind Speed Days Current Month

monthToDate.description: The total number of minutes that the wind speed was greater than or equal to 8 metres per second [m/s] or 28.8 kilometers per hour [km/h] in the current month and the number of days it has occurred on in this period.

minutes.title: Wind Speed Minutes current year
minutes.description: The number of minutes that the wind speed was greater than or equal to 8 metres per second [m/s] or 28.8 kilometers per hour [km/h] in the current year.

startTime.title: Wind Speed Start Time current year
startTime.description: he date/time of the first occurrence of the wind speed being greater than or equal to 8 metres per second [m/s] or 28.8 kilometers per hour [km/h] in the current year.

days.title: Wind Speed Days current year
days.description: The number of days the wind speed was greater than or equal to 8 metres per second [m/s] or 28.8 kilometers per hour [km/h] in the current year.

yearToDate.description: The total number of minutes that the wind speed was greater than or equal to 8 metres per second [m/s] or 28.8 kilometers per hour [km/h] in the current year and the number of days it has occurred on in this period.

erosionCondition.description: The number of minutes that the wind speed is greater than or equal to 8 metres per second [m/s] or 28.8 kilometers per hour [km/h]. The start time is available for the current day and the number of days is available for longer periods. Only calculated for stations that have a wind probe at a height that is less than or equal to 3 metres [m] above ground.

stationCode.description: This is the unique case-sensitive weather station code.

stationName.description: This is the given name of the weather station.

latitude.description: Latitude of the weather station in decimal degrees, for displaying on a map.

longitude.description: Longitude of the weather station in decimal degrees, for displaying on a map.

dateTime.description: The date and time of the last recording received from the weather station in UTC format.

to9AM.description: The last 24 hours of rainfall to 9am.

since9AM.description: The rainfall recorded since 9am in millimeters [mm].

currentHour.description: The rainfall recorded since the start of the current hour.

last24Hrs.description: The rainfall recorded in the previous 24hrs to the current time in millimeters [mm].

last7Days.description: The rainfall recorded in the last 7 days to the previous 9am in millimeters [mm].

last14Days.description: The rainfall recorded in the last 14 days to the previous 9am in millimeters [mm].

monthToDate.description: The amount of rainfall recorded so far this month in millimeters [mm].

yearToDate.description: The amount of rainfall recorded so far this year since January 1 in millimeters [mm].

period.description: The cumulative rainfall for the period defined by startDate and endDate.

rainfall.description: A collection of rainfall summary values.

stationCode.description: The unique identifier for a station. Case sensitive.

stationName.description: The human readable name of the weather station.

stationCode.description: This is the unique case-sensitive weather station code.

stationName.description: This is the given name of the weather station.

from.description: The start of the specified interval in UTC. The time returned for the daily interval will be midnight at the start of the calendar day.

to.description: The end of the specified interval in UTC. The time returned for the daily will be midnight at the start of the calendar day.

year.description: This is the year value that the summary relates to.

month.description: This is the month value that the summary relates to.

day.description: This is the day of the month that the summary relates to.

hour.description: This is the 24-hour value that the summary relates to.

minute.description: This is the minute value that the summary data relates to. In case of a 15 minute or 30 minute interval, the minute value will represent the end of the interval.

period.description: The calendar based time-period of the specified interval.

min.description: The minimum value observed within the period. In case of a daily summary (interval = 'daily'), this value is the minimum value observed in the 24 hours to 9 am on the specified day.
min.title: Air Temp Min

minTime.description: The date and time the minimum value was observed within the period in UTC. In case of a daily summary (interval = 'daily'), this value is date and time the minimum value is observed in the 24 hours to 9 am on the specified day.
minTime.title: Air Temp Min Time

max.description: The maximum value observed within the period. In case of a daily summary (interval = 'daily'), this value is the maximum value observed in the 24 hours from 9 am on the specified day.
max.title: Air Temp Max

maxTime.description: The date and time the maximum value was observed within the period in UTC. In case of a daily summary (interval = 'daily'), this value is the date and time the maximum value is observed in the 24 hours from 9 am on the specified day.
maxTime.title: Air Temp Max Time

airTemperature.description: The observed air temperature in degrees celcius [Â°C].

min.description: The minimum value observed within the period. In case of a daily summary (interval = 'daily'), this value is the minimum value observed in the 24 hours from 9 am on the specified day.
min.title: Relative Humidity Min

minTime.description: The date and time the minimum value was observed within the period in UTC. In case of a daily summary (interval = 'daily'), this value is the date and time the minimum value is observed in the 24 hours from 9 am on the specified day.
minTime.title: Relative Humidity Min Time

max.description: The maximum value observed within the period. In case of a daily summary (interval = 'daily'), this value is the maximum value observed in the 24 hours to 9 am on the specified day.
max.title: Relative Humidity Max

maxTime.description: The date and time the maximum value was observed within the period in UTC. In case of a daily summary (interval = 'daily'), this value is the date and time the maximum value is observed in the 24 hours to 9 am on the specified day.
maxTime.title: Relative Humidity Max Time

min.description: The minimum value observed within the period. In case of a daily summary (interval = 'daily'), this value is the minimum value observed in the 24 hours to 9 am on the specified day.
min.title: Soil Temp Min

minTime.description: The date and time the minimum value was observed within the period in UTC. In case of a daily summary (interval = 'daily'), this value is the date and time the minimum value is observed in the 24 hours to 9 am on the specified day.
minTime.title: Soil Temp Min Time

max.description: The maximum value observed within the period. In case of a daily summary (interval = 'daily'), this value is the maximum value observed in the 24 hours from 9 am on the specified day.
max.title: Soil Temp Max

maxTime.description: The date and time the maximum value was observed within the period in UTC. In case of a daily summary (interval = 'daily'), this value is the date and time the maximum value is observed in the 24 hours from 9 am on the specified day.
maxTime.title: Soil Temp Max Time

soilTemperature.description: The soil temperature observed at 4 cm depth within the period in degrees celcius [Â°C].

height.description: The height of the sensor in meters [m].
height.title: Sensor Height [m]

speed.description: The average wind speed observed over the period measured in kilometers per hour [km/h].
speed.title: Average Wind Speed

avg.description: The average wind speed observed over the period. In the case of a daily summary (interval=daily), this value is based on the 24 hours from 12am (midnight) on the specified day.

speed.description: The maximum wind speed observed measured in kilometers per hour [km/h].
speed.title: Max Wind Speed

time.description: The date and time in [UTC] format of the maximum wind speed.
time.title: Max Wind Speed Time

degrees.description: The wind direction of the maximum wind speed observed in azimuth degrees
degrees.title: Max Speed Wind Direction (deg)

compassPoint.description: The wind direction of the maximum wind speed observed as a compass point.
compassPoint.title: Max Speed Wind Direction (compass)

direction.description: The wind direction of the maximum wind speed observed over the period.

max.description: The maximum wind speed observed over the period. In the case of a daily summary (interval=daily), this value is based on the 24 hours from 12am (midnight) on the specified day

wind.description: The wind observations of one or more wind sensors at various heights.

panEvaporation.description: Class A pan evaporation value calculated using the Penman-Monteith formulation. In case of a daily summary (interval = 'daily'), this value is based on the 24 hours to 9 am on the specified day.

shortCrop.description: Short crop evapotranspiration value calculated at 0.12 metres [m] using the FAO56 Penman-Monteith method. In case of a daily summary (interval = 'daily'), this value is based on the 24 hours from 12 am (midnight) on the specified day.
shortCrop.title: Short Crop Evapotranspiration

tallCrop.description: Tall crop evapotranspiration value calculated at 0.5 metres [m] using the FAO56 Penman-Monteith method. In case of a daily summary (interval = 'daily'), this value is based on the 24 hours from 12 am (midnight) on the specified day
tallCrop.title: Tall Crop Evapotranspiration

solarExposure.description: The solar exposure for the period in kilojoules per square meters [kJ/m2]. In case of a daily summary (interval = 'daily'), this value is the solar exposure observed in the 24 hours from 12 am (midnight) on the specified day.

rainfall.description: The total rainfall for the period in millimeters [mm]. In case of a daily summary (interval = 'daily'), this value is the total rainfall observed in the 24 hours to 9 am on the specified day.

stationCode.description: This is the unique case-sensitive weather station code.
stationCode.title: Station Code

stationName.description: This is the name of the weather station.
stationName.title: Station Name

dateTime.description: The date time if the last recording received from the weather station in UTC format.
dateTime.title: Last Recording Date/time

to9AM.description: % observations to 9am (out of the expected number of observations)

since9AM.description: % observations since 9am (out of expected number of observations)

since12AM.description: % observations since 12am (out of expected number of observations)

currentHour.description: % observations in the current hour (out of expected number of observations).

last24Hours.description: % observations in the last 24 hours to current time (out of expected number of observations).
last24Hours.x-ms-tooltip: The percentage of observations recorded in the last 24 hours to the current time (out of the expected number of observations). This is made up of time from the current hour and the previous 23 hours.

since9AM.description: % observations in last 7 days to current time. Made up of the current day since 9am and previous 6 days over the daily 24 hour period since 9am.
since9AM.title: Since 9am (7 days)

since12AM.description: % observations in last 7 days to current time. Made up of the current day since 12am and previous 6 days over the daily 24 hour period since 12am.
since12AM.title: Since 12am (7 days)

since9AM.description: % observations in last 14 days to the current time. Made up of the current day since 9am and previous 13 days over the daily 24 hour period since 9am).
since9AM.title: Since 9am (14 days)

since12AM.description: % observations in last 14 days to current time. Made up of the current day since 12am and previous 13 days over the daily 24 hour period since 12am.
since12AM.title: Since 12am (14 days)

to9AM.description: % of observations recorded so far this month based on daily 24 hour period to 9am, including the current incomplete 24 hour period since 9am
to9AM.title: Since 9am (Month to date)

since12AM.description: % of observations recorded so far this month based on daily 24 hour period to 12am, including the current incomplete 24 hour period since 12am
since12AM.title: Since 12am (Month to date)

monthToDate.description: % of observations recorded so far this month (out of expected number of observations).

to9AM.description: % of observations recorded so far this year based on the daily 24 hours period to 9am, including the current incomplete 24 hour period since 9am.
to9AM.title: Since 9am (Year to date)

since12AM.description: % of observations recorded so far this year, based on the daily 24 hour period from 12am, including the current incomplete 24 hour period since 12am.
since12AM.title: Since 12am (Year to date)

yearToDate.description: % of observations recorded so far this year (out of expected number of observations).

9AM.title: 9AM period
9AM.description: The percentage of observations recorded in the supplied period since 9AM

12AM.title: 12AM period
12AM.description: The percentage of observations recorded in the supplied period since 12AM

period.description: The percentage of observations recorded in the supplied period.}

stationAvailabilityModel.description: Various metrics related to the historical availability of a weather station.

stationCode.description: This is the unique case-sensitive weather station code.

stationName.description: This is the given name of the weather station.

latitude.description: Latitude of the weather station in decimal degrees, used for displaying on a map.

longitude.description: Longitude of the weather station in decimal degrees, used for displaying on a map.

owner.description: The owner of the weather station.

ownerCode.description: The short identifying code for the station's owner.

altitude.description: Altitude of the weather station measured in meters [m] above sea level.

model.description: The model of the weather station.

startDate.description: The commissioning date of the weather station.

endDate.description: The decommissioning date of the weather station.

online.description: Indicates that a weather station is online or has been manually taken offline due to malfunction or communication error.

probeHeight.description: Probe height for temperature and humidity gauge measured in meters [m] above ground level

rainGaugeHeight.description: Height of the rain gauge measured in meters [m] above ground level.

windProbeHeights.description: A list of wind probe heights for the weather station measured in meters [m] above the ground. Values are ordered from low to high.

comments.description: Any comments regarding the weather station.

status.description: The weather station status. Closed stations are weather stations that have been permanently turned off and no longer report data

jobNumber.description: This is a job number allocated to any work carried out on a weather station. The MEA job number.

href.description: Specifies the URL of the page the link goes to.
href.title: URL

rel.description: Specifies the relationship between the current document and the linked document.
rel.title: Relationship

linksModel.description: A series of links related to the endpoint.

offsetInQuery.name: offset
offsetInQuery.description: The pagination offset parameter specifies the first entry to return from a collection.

limitInQuery.name: limit
limitInQuery.description: The pagination limit parameter restricts the number of entries returned.

sortInQuery.name: sort
sortInQuery.description: A comma separated list of fields to sort by. Defaults to ascending. Prepend '-' for descending. For wind fields you can only sort or select by the lowest sensor.

groupInQuery.name: group
groupInQuery.description: Filter the stations to a predefined group. These need to be supported on the back end. 'all' returns all stations, 'api' returns the default stations in use with the API, 'web' returns the list in use by the weather.agric.wa.gov.au and 'rtd' returns stations with scientifically complete datasets.

includeClosedInQuery.name: includeClosed
includeClosedInQuery.description: Include Open and Closed Stations (defaults to false)

selectInQuery.name: select
selectInQuery.description: A comma separated list of fields to include in the result. Note that this will not include station codes or names unless explicitly included.

startDateInQuery.name: startDate
startDateInQuery.description: The start of the range to return summaries for. Will return data inclusive of this range.

endDateInQuery.name: endDate
endDateInQuery.description: The end of the range to return summaries for. Will return data inclusive of this range.

startDateImportantInQuery.name: startDate
startDateImportantInQuery.description: The start of the range to return summaries for. Will return data inclusive of this range.

endDateImportantInQuery.name: endDate
endDateImportantInQuery.description: The end of the range to return summaries for. Will return data inclusive of this range.

startMonthImportantInQuery.name: startMonth
startMonthImportantInQuery.description: The start of the range to return summaries for (eg 2022-01). Will return data inclusive of this range

endMonthImportantInQuery.name: endMonth
endMonthImportantInQuery.description: The end of the range to return summaries for (eg 2022-01). Will return data inclusive of this range

startYearImportantInQuery.name: startYear
startYearImportantInQuery.description: The start of the range to return summaries for (eg 2021). Will return data inclusive of this range.

endYearImportantInQuery.name: endYear
endYearImportantInQuery.description: The end of the range to return summaries for (eg 2021). Will return data inclusive of this range.

startDateTimeInQuery.name: startDateTime
startDateTimeInQuery.description: The start of the range to return summaries for, in ISO8601 format. Will return data inclusive of this range.

endDateTimeInQuery.name: endDateTime
endDateTimeInQuery.description: The end of the range to return summaries for, in ISO8601 format. Will return data inclusive of this range

stationCodeLookupInQuery.name: stationCode
stationCodeLookupInQuery.description: A comma separated list of case-sensitive station codes. Limits the stations which will be returned.
